Summary: It a shape like half circle arc like a bow that you shoot with arrows. Three lights top middle and bottom. Middle was the biggest.
divs: Sighting DetailsIt was July 4 at 905 pm. My brother came running in saying there is a ufo outside. Me and my wife jumped up and ran outside. This is the second ufo I have seen outside my house. The only recording device I have is an iPhone. Could not get it to pick up the object. This object was visible for at least five mins.. Granted it was the Fourth of July but this was no firework. This looked like a bow that you shoot arrows with. It had thee lights from top to bottom. With the middle light the biggest.. When it left it headed west and moved very fast. This object was huge also no planes to compare it to, but well over five hundred feet.
trends: There have been 12 other sightings in Conway
There was one other sighting in Conway on or around July 4th 2013
